document.full_text: an austrian archaeological team has used radar imaging to determine the extent of the ruins of the one time 3,500-year-old capital of egypt's foreign occupiers, said the antiquities department sunday.
document.title: radar reveals extent of buried ancient egyptian city
lines_and_colors: an austrian archaeological team has used radar imaging to determine the extent of the ruins of the one time 3,500-year-old capital of egypt's foreign occupiers, said the antiquities department sunday.
